programme.desc: In a small coastal village, the Maori descend from Paikea, the Whale Rider. In every generation, a male heir has succeeded to the chiefly title. When twins are born, and the boy twin dies, the chief is unable to accept his grand-daughter, Pai, as a future leader. Koro, the chief, is convinced that the tribe's misfortunes began at Pai's birth and calls for people to bring their sons to him, sure a new leader will emerge. Pai loves Koro more than anyone in the world, but she must fight him and a thousand years of tradition to fulfill her destiny.

programme.title: Down
programme.desc: When the express elevators in New York City's 102-story Millennium Building start to malfunction, elevator mechanics Mark (James Marshall) and Jeff (Eric Thal) are sent to find the cause. After a series of gruesome and deadly accidents occur, Mark joins forces with a reporter named Jennifer (Naomi Watts). As the death toll rises and the building is sealed off amid claims of terrorism, Mark and Jennifer attempt to unravel the secret behind the mysterious behavior of the elevator.(n)

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom.(n)

programme.title: Changeling
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Clint Eastwood directs this drama in which Academy Award winner Angelina Jolie's kidnapped son is found alive. She realizes that the child returned to her is not her own. She faces corrupt police and a skeptical public in her relentless pursuit of answers, only to be confronted by a truth that will change her forever. Set in 1920s Los Angeles, the film also stars Academy Award nominee John Malkovich.(n)

programme.title: Don't Sleep
programme.desc: Shawn and Zach are young lovers who move into a guesthouse together on an estate owned by Mr. and Mrs. Marino. When bizarre events begin to occur, Zach slowly remembers a forgotten time in his childhood when he suffered from severe and violent psychosis - memories erased by a series of electroconvulsive shock treatments administered by his psychiatrist. As the terrors surrounding their lives grow to deadly proportions, Zach is forced to question his own sanity.(n)

programme.title: It Stains The Sands Red
programme.desc: In the throes of a zombie apocalypse, Molly - a troubled woman from Las Vegas with a dark past - finds herself stranded in the desert with a ravenous zombie on her tail. At first, she's easily able to outpace her undead pursuer, but things quickly become worse when she realizes the zombie doesn't need to ever stop and rest. Running low on supplies and beat down by the harsh environment, Molly must summon strength she never knew she had in order to face it.(n)

programme.title: Kelly's Hollywood
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the intimate story of an aspiring actor who brings his sister, born with Down syndrome, out to Los Angeles to pursue her dream of becoming a Hollywood diva. But as her health begins to fail and she becomes increasing jealous of his fiancée, he is forced to confront his co-dependent sibling relationship and the threat it is posing to his engagement.(n)

programme.title: Before I Fall
programme.desc: Sam (Zoey Deutch) seems to have everything a teenage girl could want: popularity, a hot boyfriend, cool status, fun friends, loving family and seeming happiness. But beyond the superficial, Sam's life isn't so charmed. She is one of a clique of high school mean girls who make life hell for those who are different. When Sam is killed in a car accident, she is forced to relive her last day on Earth seven times in order to get things right. She attempts to make sense of what befell her and gain a better understanding of herself and others.(n)

programme.title: Miles To Go Before I Sleep
programme.desc: Short documentary chronicling the true story of famed musicians and the relationships they have with their roadies. Features music legends Chad Smith (Red Hot Chili Peppers), Chris Shiflett (Foo Fighters) and Jim James (My Morning Jacket), who speak candidly about their time on the road and the importance of the crew who work tirelessly to put the show together, as well as capturing a day behind-the-scenes with the crew of Pearl Jam.(n)

programme.title: Lucky Break
programme.desc: Peter Cattaneo ("The Full Monty") directs this British comedy starring James Nesbitt as Jimmy Hands, a raffish robber assigned to a grim correctional facility. When the prison's governor (Christopher Plummer) is persuaded to stage a production of a misguided musical based on the story of Admiral Nelson and Lady Emma Hamilton, Jimmy and his buddies seize the opportunity to plan a jailbreak. However, complicating matters is a lovely therapist (Olivia Williams), who, cast as Jimmy's costar, steals his heart. Timothy Spall and Lennie James costar.(n)

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town.(n)

programme.title: Alterations
programme.desc: Charmaine decides to get a breast augmentation and asks Tara to help her recover - then gets the surprise of her life when it's "Buck" who appears at her bedside; Kate counsels Marshall to play "hard to get" with Jason.(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Abundance
programme.desc: Max decides to embrace his time with "Alice," when Tara's personality is nowhere to be found; Marshall and Jason grow closer but only platonically.(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Lady Psycho Killer
programme.desc: A knife-wielding killer is on the loose in a small town slicing and dicing men of questionable intent. As her brutality leaves the town littered with corpses, her bloodlust is lost on her young lover who pursues her anyway.(n)

programme.title: Fair Game (2010)
programme.desc: The real-life scandal involving the public exposure of Valerie Plame as an undercover CIA agent by vindictive White House officials determined to punish her husband Joe Wilson for his political views is recounted in this drama starring Naomi Watts, Sean Penn and Sam Shepard.(n)

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong.(n)

programme.title: Before I Fall
programme.desc: Sam (Zoey Deutch) seems to have everything a teenage girl could want: popularity, a hot boyfriend, cool status, fun friends, loving family and seeming happiness. But beyond the superficial, Sam's life isn't so charmed. She is one of a clique of high school mean girls who make life hell for those who are different. When Sam is killed in a car accident, she is forced to relive her last day on Earth seven times in order to get things right. She attempts to make sense of what befell her and gain a better understanding of herself and others.(n)

programme.title: Tension
programme.desc: Film-noir suspense tale about a timid, cuckolded pharmacist who undertakes a methodical plan to murder his wife's lover, but when someone beats him to it, the husband becomes the prime suspect.

programme.title: High Wall
programme.desc: A World War II veteran suffering from a recurring brain injury teams with a woman psychiatrist to prove himself innocent of his wife's murder.

programme.title: Lady in the Lake
programme.desc: Subjective camera work allows the viewer to see this film-noir mystery transpire through the eyes of a private detective who finds murder while investigating the case of a missing woman. The script was adapted from the Raymond Chandler novel; and Robert Montgomery directed and stars as private eye Philip Marlowe.

programme.title: The Unsuspected
programme.desc: A popular radio-show host recites spooky murder mysteries on his program, and the homicides he presents contain intimate and excruciating details because he had committed the actual crimes in real life.

programme.title: Chubasco
programme.desc: A wayward youth chooses a stint on a fishing boat as an alternative to jail but refuses to give up on the woman he loves despite her father's interference.

programme.title: Ask Father
programme.desc: Silent comedy short stars Harold Lloyd as a young man trying to get permission to marry a man's daughter. Snub Pollard, Bebe Daniels.

programme.title: Never Weaken
programme.desc: Harold Lloyd comedy short in which he tries to help save his girlfriend's job as a chiropractor's secretary by drumming up business for the man. Later, Lloyd turns suicidal when he mistakenly believes she wants to dump him and marry another. Mildred Davis, Roy Brooks. Directed by Fred C. Newmeyer. Cowritten by Hal Roach and Sam Taylor.

programme.title: High and Dizzy
programme.desc: In this silent comedy, Harold Lloyd stars as a novice doctor lacking patients, but finding one, and a love interest, in a young woman with a sleepwalking problem that lands both her and an inebriated Lloyd, on a ledge high atop a building. The object of his affection is played by Lloyd's future wife, Mildred Davis. Lloyd's real-life brother, Gaylord Lloyd, costars.

programme.title: An Eastern Westerner
programme.desc: The father of a spoiled young New Yorker ships him out West to a ranch, where he hopes the lad will toughen up and learn a bit of responsibility. Once there, he squares off against a town bully and falls for a local belle.

programme.title: Among Those Present
programme.desc: This silent comedy stars Harold Lloyd as a coatroom checker who impersonates an English nobleman to help a social-climbing family impress their fellow swells. Mildred Davis (who would later become the real-life Mrs. Lloyd) costars as the family's attractive daughter who falls for Lloyd's bogus royal.

programme.title: Now or Never
programme.desc: Harold Lloyd stars as a babysitter who, with his young charge (Anna May Bilson) in tow, tries to dodge a train conductor because they haven't paid for tickets. Mary: Mildred Davis. Directed by Hal Roach. Also known as “The Baby Sitter.

programme.title: Why Worry?
programme.desc: Harold Lloyd plays a rich hypochondriac caught up in a revolution in this silent classic. Fred Newmeyer directed.

programme.title: Hot Water
programme.desc: Harold Lloyd stars in this silent comedy about a harassed middle-class husband. Jobyna Ralston, Josephine Crowell, Charles Stevenson. Directed by Sam Taylor and Fred Newmeyer.

programme.title: For Heaven's Sake
programme.desc: Harold Lloyd is a playboy redeemed by a mission woman in this silent classic.

programme.title: The Kid Brother
programme.desc: Melodrama mixes with humor in this silent film about a small-town lad involved with a showgirl and a hunt for stolen funds.

programme.title: Welcome Danger
programme.desc: The scientist son of the former San Francisco police chief takes over the job from his father and busts up a drug ring headed by a prominent citizen.

programme.title: Feet First
programme.desc: Harold Lloyd's stunts highlight this farce about the transoceanic misadventures of a shoe clerk. Mary: Barbara Kent. Tanner: Robert McWade. Mrs. Tanner: Lillian Leighton. Garson: Alec B. Francis. Ship's Officer: Noah Young. Directed by Clyde Bruckman.

programme.title: The Milky Way
programme.desc: Harold Lloyd in a farce about a timid milkman who becomes a prizefighter. Gabby: Adolphe Menjou. Ann: Verree Teasdale. Speed: William Gargan. Mrs. LeMoyne: Marjorie Gateson. Polly: Dorothy Wilson. Mae: Helen Mack. Austin: George Barbier. Spider: Lionel Stander. Willard: Charles Lane. Wonderful cast. Expert direction by Leo McCarey.

programme.title: Safety Last
programme.desc: Classic Harold Lloyd silent about a store clerk who organizes a publicity stunt in which his friend climbs the side of a tall building, but a confluence of events forces him to perform the dangerous act himself. Famous for the scene in which Lloyd hangs from the hands of a clock atop the building.

programme.title: Girl Shy
programme.desc: Harold Lloyd stars as the bashful author of a book about wooing women, who, on the way to the big city to get it published, meets a young beauty and they fall for each other. But when his manuscript is turned down, he deems himself not worthy of her love, until he learns that she's about to marry another.

programme.title: The Freshman
programme.desc: A bumbling not-so-big man on a college campus crashes through a collection of classic sight gags in this classic satire of college life.

programme.title: Speedy
programme.desc: Harold Lloyd, in his last silent film, plays a young man trying to help his girlfriend's grandfather, who operates New York's last horse-drawn trolley, which underhanded railway magnates are trying to get their hands on. Baseball immortal Babe Ruth has a cameo.

programme.title: Movie Crazy
programme.desc: Spoof of Hollywood, with comedian Harold Lloyd as a country bumpkin determined to become a film star. Constance Cummings. Mrs. Kitterman: Louise Closser Hale. Assistant Director: Eddie Featherstone. Vance: Kenneth Thomson. O'Brien: Spencer Charters. Fine cast. Clyde Bruckman directed.

programme.title: The Cat's Paw
programme.desc: Political farce with Harold Lloyd as a mayoral candidate who upsets his town's politicians. Petunia: Una Merkel. Jake: George Barbier. Strozzi: Nat Pendleton. Dolores: Grace Bradley. Mayor Morgan: Alan Dinehart. McGee: Grant Mitchell. Wang: Fred Warren. Shigley: J. Farrell MacDonald. Red: James Donlan. Co-scripted by Lloyd.

programme.title: The Cat and the Fiddle
programme.desc: A struggling composer's latest opera is threatened when the leading lady walks out, followed by the male lead. The composer must play the part himself, and he enlists the help of a female music student who is engaged to a wealthy philanderer. Soon the composer and the student fall in love.

programme.title: The Firefly
programme.desc: A Spanish spy goes undercover as a singer in order to uncover Napoleon's plans to invade her homeland. A version of the Friml operetta.

programme.title: The Merry Widow
programme.desc: A playboy prince from a small country is forced to court a wealthy widow in order to ensure that her money stays in their homeland.

programme.title: Smilin' Through
programme.desc: The old romantic classic about a love that endured the years makes a fine vehicle for Jeanette MacDonald in her prime. John: Brian Aherne. Kenneth: Gene Raymond. Ellen: Frances Robinson. Owen: Ian Hunter. Willie: Patrick O'Moore. Charles: Eric Lonsdale.

programme.title: San Francisco
programme.desc: Set around the devastating 1906 earthquake and fire, it's the tale of a a sinful gambling-hall owner, a saloon singer who dreams of the opera, and a priest who's trying to help them both stay on the straight and narrow.

programme.title: Cairo
programme.desc: An American movie star is mistaken for a Nazi spy, and thwarts Axis espionage in North Africa with help from her maidservant and a reporter.

programme.title: The Sun Comes Up
programme.desc: In her final film, Jeanette MacDonald shares the screen with canine star Lassie and plays a concert singer embittered by her young son's death.

programme.title: Maytime
programme.desc: In the third pairing of "Singing Sweethearts" Nelson Eddy and Jeanette MacDonald, she portrays an opera star reminiscing about her career and a tragic romance with a street singer (Eddy) in Paris and later the U.S. The score was Oscar-nominated.(n)

programme.title: Rose Marie
programme.desc: An opera singer, on the hunt for her own criminal brother, goes undercover and ventures into the Canadian wilderness.(n)

programme.title: Naughty Marietta
programme.desc: A French princess flees to Colonial New Orleans to avoid her arranged marriage, and unexpectedly finds true love in this lighthearted operetta.(n)

programme.title: New Moon
programme.desc: Romberg and Hammerstein's operetta set in 18th-century Louisiana concerns the relationship between a haughty plantation owner and her handsome bondservant, who's actually a French nobleman in disguise.(n)

programme.title: I Married an Angel
programme.desc: Rodgers and Hart's stage musical about a banker (Nelson Eddy) who dreams he marries an angel (Jeanette MacDonald). Peter: Edward Everett Horton. Baron: Douglass Dumbrille. Peggy: Binnie Barnes. Sufi: Janis Carter. Whiskers: Reginald Owen. Directed by W.S. Van Dyke II.(n)

programme.title: Island of Love
programme.desc: Runyonesque caper about a con man (Robert Preston) teaming with a writer (Tony Randall) to turn an island into a phony tourist trap. Georgia Moll, Walter Matthau, Betty Bruce, Michael Constantine. Filmed in Greece.(n)

programme.title: Onionhead
programme.desc: A lazy college student joins the Coast Guard as a cook when his grades drop and his relationship with a girlfriend sours. Fully expecting to sit out WWII in peace and quiet, instead, he runs afoul of navy protocol in general and an officer in particular.(n)

programme.title: Ensign Pulver
programme.desc: Joshua Logan's sequel to "Mister Roberts," about life on a World War II Navy cargo ship, features Robert Walker Jr. as the title character, an officer butting heads with his tyrannical skipper. Jack Lemmon won a Best Supporting Actor Oscar as Ensign Pulver in the original. Jack Nicholson appears in the supporting cast.(n)

programme.title: Charade
programme.desc: A woman in Paris flees murderous crooks who seek a hidden World War II fortune stolen by her late husband, and receives unlikely assistance from a handsome sophisticate with a hidden agenda.(n)

programme.title: Cactus Flower
programme.desc: Adaptation of the stage hit about a philandering dentist (Walter Matthau), his nurse (Ingrid Bergman) and kooky girlfriend (Best Supporting Actress Goldie Hawn). Harvey: Jack Weston. Igor: Rick Lenz. Sanchez: Vito Scotti. Mrs. Durant: Irene Hervey. Georgia: Eve Bruce. Smartly directed by Gene Saks. I.A.L. Diamond screenplay. Quincy Jones score.(n)

programme.title: Fail Safe
programme.desc: When a misguided transmission sends a squadron of bombers hurtling towards Russia, fully prepared to drop their atomic weaponry on Moscow, an Air Force commander desperately tries to establish radio contact with the planes, but once the pilots have passed the "fail safe" point, they've been instructed to disregard any reversal of orders.(n)

programme.title: The Sunshine Boys
programme.desc: Neil Simon adapted his Broadway hit about two elderly ex-vaudevillians who have been feuding for years but agree to put aside their differences for a TV reunion. In his first starring screen role in 35 years, George Burns took home a Best Supporting Actor Oscar. Simon's screenplay was Oscar nomimated.(n)

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: A teen finds himself at the center of a battle to save Earth from transforming alien robots. (cc).
Historical saga, set in 480 B.C., about a Spartan king leading 300 warriors against an overwhelming force of Persian invaders. The film is based on Frank Miller's graphic novel "300." (cc).

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When a bowler's remains are found in an automatic pinsetter in the Season 6 finale, Booth goes undercover to fill an injured Max's slot on the victim's team to look for clues and suspects. Meanwhile, a pregnant Angela works via Webcam from the hospital. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Bones
programme.sub-title: The Memories in the Shallow Grave
programme.desc: In the seventh-season premiere, the team investigate the death of a woman with a history of amnesia, disappearances and head trauma whose corpse is found in a shallow grave. Meanwhile, Booth and a very pregnant Brennan discuss their living arrangements once their baby is born. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Bones
programme.sub-title: The Hot Dog in the Competition
programme.desc: A new squintern (Luke Kleintank) makes an immediate contribution to a case involving the death of a competitive eater, whose remains are identified before a premiere event, but his delinquent past makes his welcome to the Jeffersonian a rude one. Meanwhile, Brennan's announcement about her baby irks Booth, and it challenges them to reconsider each other's perspective. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: A toy-company CEO (Morgan Fairchild) grants Booth and Sweets access to its top-secret lab after the remains of a female executive are discovered in a shrink-wrapped doll. Meanwhile, Daisy helps Sweets in his quest for a permit to carry a gun, though Booth doesn't agree that he should; and Brennan learns a little about motherhood and the importance of toys. programme.desc: A widow poses as a nanny to seek revenge against a new mother, who does not know that their pasts are intertwined. (repeat) (cc).

(repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: While visiting his white girlfriend's family, an African-American man discovers that their seemingly idyllic community is hiding a sinister conspiracy—one that involves the disappearance of several black people in the area. (cc).

programme.title: Land of the Dead

The dead now dominate the streets of most American cities, while humanity has fled to urban skyscrapers, where safety can be found for a price. (cc).

programme.title: Guilty as Sin
programme.desc: A successful lawyer takes on the case of a husband accused of murdering his wife. His flirtatious manner and questionable financial standings lead her to doubt this latest client, and she must stealthily outsmart him to protect herself and her career. (cc).

programme.title: The Deer Hunter

programme.title: Psycho

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider The Cradle of Life

programme.title: Caught in the Crossfire

programme.title: The Thin Red Line

programme.title: Collateral

programme.desc: Rob, Chanel and Steelo get to the bottom of fake news with "Video or Didn't Happen," describe the joy that is a "Crowdgasm" and see what happens when you take too much melatonin and go "Melatonic." (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Exes Ron and Sammi try to work on their friendship, but prove that old habits die hard. Also: Mike tries taking his friendship with Snooki to the next level; the gang learns they'll be working at a pizzeria. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Deena commits a "robbery" on both Mike and Vinny with a pair of female twins; Snooki finds out that Mike's been telling people they hooked up. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: The guys harass Deena for hooking up with Vinny's girl; Ronnie and Sam are back to their old ways, and this time, Mike gets involved in their drama. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Mike and Ronnie come to blows over Mike's meddling ways. Later, Mike leaves the house on a stretcher, and Ronnie considers leaving Italy. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Pauly and Vinny put on a "guido-theme" comedy show; Snooki becomes so distraught over her relationship woes that the girls decide to intervene; Ron and Sam try to patch things up once again. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: The gang checks out the Italian shore, and after a day of hard partying, Snooki and Deena end up in bed together. Later, when they get back to Florence, the girls have a run-in with the police...literally. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Snooki and Deena are released from the police station after their accident. Later, Snooki's boyfriend Jionni visits, but their romantic reunion comes to an abrupt halt, and a sobbing Snooki ends the night alone on the streets of Florence. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Snooki is devastated over her big fight with Jionni, and decides to take a break from the relationship. Mike thinks it's finally his chance to win her over, but it's someone else who ends up comforting her. Meanwhile, Deena has a pregnancy scare. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: The boys visit Vinny's family in Sicily, while the girls head to Tuscany for a wine tour. Later, Snooki learns the truth about her and Vinny's hookup, and she decides to come clean to Jionni. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Deena continues to pursue Pauly. Later, she and Snooki get an icy reception at a nightclub. Meanwhile, Mike is back to stirring up drama, prompting the whole house to turn on him. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: The gang gets ready to say good-bye to Italy and head back to Seaside Heights in the Season 4 finale, but tensions between Mike and the rest of the roommates leave him doubtful that he'll be joining them back at the Jersey Shore. (repeat).(n)

programme.desc: Dla tych, którzy twierdzą, że w telewizjach muzycznych i radiach pojawia się za mało polskiej muzyki, Eska TV proponuje program "Polska noc". To całonocne pasmo zarezerwowane jest dla krajowych wykonawców.

programme.title: Słoiki
programme.desc: Prawdzie historie ludzi, którzy przyjechali do Warszawy, by odmienić swoje życie. Mieszkańcy niewielkich miast i wsi liczą, że w stolicy uda im się zrealizować marzenia o lepszej pracy i pieniądzach. Nie łatwo jest im jednak odnaleźć się w wielkomiejskiej rzeczywistości.

programme.title: Dzień dobry
programme.desc: Poranne pasmo muzyczne, w którym prezentowane są najlepsze teledyski artystów cieszących się dużą popularnością.

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: 10 hitów 1 po 2
programme.desc: Twórcy programu w każdym wydaniu prezentują 10 wybranych hitów. Utwory, będące największymi przebojami najsłynniejszych wykonawców, grane są jeden po drugim.

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.

Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: Słoiki
programme.desc: Prawdzie historie ludzi, którzy przyjechali do Warszawy, by odmienić swoje życie. Mieszkańcy niewielkich miast i wsi liczą, że w stolicy uda im się zrealizować marzenia o lepszej pracy i pieniądzach. Nie łatwo jest im jednak odnaleźć się w wielkomiejskiej rzeczywistości.(n)

programme.title: Co się słucha?
programme.desc: Prowadzący sprawdzają, czego słuchają przypadkowo spotkani na ulicy ludzie.

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.
